skill.name: token-saver
skill.description: Reduce OpenClaw AI costs by optimizing workspace files, model selection, and chat compaction. Analyzes .md files for compression, audits AI model usage, and recommends chat compaction thresholds. Writes to AGENTS.md for persistent mode. Accesses home directory to read OpenClaw config and session history.
